snippet.title: Okashi Towers - Trailer (Alpha)
snippet.description:
The first teaser/trailler for the new game I am working on as a collaboration (artwork by Shiru) called Okashi Towers

Okashi Towers is a Halloween themed Real Time Strategy game with Tower Defense elements. Gather candy resources to build tower units or go on offense and summon cute creatures to attack other player bases. Join with up to 8 players and choose one of the four factions that fits your play style best

Follow Shiru on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Shiruht1
